name: FIST Stories: Lucky's Night
description:
Investigator: 4814 

Code Name: "Lucky" 

Background:  Lucky was a dream of a talented engineer to build a system that can calculate and designate multiple investigation targets at a time. The 48th version was found broken and rewired by a group of private scientists. They called themselves "Open Minded" and wanted to bring to light the corrupted structure of the World Science Association(WSA). Unfortunately, many group members were gone or killed. Lucky's best friend and its maintenance engineer asked Lucky to continue investigating supernatural activities related to the WSA because he believed that Lucky was its last member and the most skilled investigator in their history.

In this story, Lucky will investigate a disappearance of a science team that tried to research supernatural activity in an abandoned house. 

The story is based on the table game FIST. You can find more info here: https://claymorerpgs.itch.io/fist

I made it with the help of assets from the unity asset store:

HFPSkit by ThunderWire Studio

Puzzler by 

Dizzy Media

Low Poly assets by JustCreate

music from LARA'S HORROR SOUNDS (youtube channel)

My name is Vlad, and I had fun constructing this small story. 

Thank you for checking it out.
